Nerd.desc: An online store for digital games focused on the distribution of national games.

Port.desc: A portfolio project that uses Next.js to create an efficient page that optimizes the page's SEO.

Vote.desc: A simple polling vote application that is easy to use, with WebSocket integration and a Redis database.

Boom.desc: An e-commerce offering replica sneakers at a good and accessible price.

msgMain.pt2: I have 18 years old. I seek to improve my programming skills through new technologies. I always seek new learning experiences and doing things myself.

Messages.m1: Hello, Henrique! I would like to know more about your education. Where did you studied?
Messages.m2: Hi, President Obama! I attended high school integrated with technical education in Systems Development at ETEC Uirapuru.
Messages.m3: That's impressive! Did you take any additional courses?
Messages.m4: Yes, I completed courses in React, Node.js, and NestJS on Udemy. I also participated in Rocketseat's NLW.
Messages.m5: Excellent! How did these additional courses contribute to your education?
Messages.m6: They deepened my practical knowledge and kept me updated with the latest technologies in web development.
Messages.m7: Very good, Henrique. It's great to see you investing in your education.
Messages.m8: Thank you, President Obama! I'm glad to share this with you.
